column1: #Text=" Shady Shin says : " Here 's your 10,000 yuans .
#Text=Not bad , considering all you have to do is lose your match tonight .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Can you believe that ingrate mook ?
#Text=I mean , I hate to see Toza lose , even if he needs to .
#Text=You did n't see any pro-benders crying for us when mom and dad died , and we got dumped on the street .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " And speaking of hustling , you two need to hit the bricks and collect enough bets to make this little investment pay off .
#Text='Cause if you do n't , you 're gon na be right back in the dumpster where I found ya .
#Text=" Mako says : " Do n't worry , bro .
#Text=" Shady Shin says : " Seeing those young crooks really gives me hope for the future .
